name: Neon Nexus
description:
Neon Nexus is an intense sci-fi roguelite game that takes place in a futuristic world filled with danger and adventure. Players take on the role of a highly skilled and agile character who must navigate through multiple levels of neon-lit cityscapes filled with deadly enemies, challenging obstacles, and thrilling parkour-style movement.

The game features a wide range of character upgrades that can be unlocked and utilized throughout the game, allowing players to customize their play style and adapt to different challenges. Upgrades include enhancements to speed, agility, strength, weapon proficiency, and much more.

One of the most exciting aspects of Neon Nexus is the parkour movement system, which allows players to run, jump, slide, and wall-run their way through the game's environments with incredible speed and precision. With the addition of wall running, players can seamlessly transition from floor to wall and back again, creating an exhilarating sense of fluidity and freedom in movement.

Of course, the game wouldn't be complete without intense combat sequences, and Neon Nexus delivers on that front as well. Players must engage in fast-paced shootouts with the cities brutal and oppressive police force.

As a roguelite game, Neon Nexus offers high replayability, with procedurally generated levels that are different every time you play. Each playthrough presents a new challenge, and every decision you make can have a lasting impact on your success. The game also features a highscore system, allowing players to try and get the best time they can.
